title: John Muir National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          Â    Visitor Center Information  Begin your exploration of John Muir's life and legacy at the visitor center, located at 4202 Alhambra Avenue in Martinez, California. Watch the 20-minute film, A Glorious Journey, to gain an in-depth view of Muir's contributions to conservation. You may explore the house and the grounds on your own.   John Muir National Historic Site Address: 4202 Alhambra Ave Martinez, CA 94553 (925) 228-8860  Hours Of Operation: Muir Home Site: Open 7 days a week from 10:00am to 5:00pm, year-round, except for holidays listed. Mount Wanda Site: Open from sunrise to sunset. Some programs take place at night, which are ranger-guided only.    Holidays Closed on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day.
